Interface ICustomerActions

All Known Implementing Classes:
OccasionalMenuController, PayBillEntryController, PaymentUIController, SubscriberMenuController, ViewReservationController
public interface ICustomerActions
Behavioral contract for customer-related activities in the Bistro system. Provides a centralized navigation engine for switching between different customer screens.

  • Method Details

    • createNewReservation

      default void createNewReservation(ChatClient client, javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String userType, int userId)
      Navigates the user to the New Reservation screen.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered the navigation.
      userType - The type/role of the logged-in user.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.

    • payBill

      default void payBill(ChatClient client, javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String userType, int userId)
      Navigates the user to the Payment Code entry screen.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered the navigation.
      userType - The type/role of the logged-in user.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.

    • viewReservation

      default void viewReservation(ChatClient client, javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String userType, int userId)
      Navigates the user to the screen where they can view existing reservations.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered the navigation.
      userType - The type/role of the logged-in user.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.

    • viewOrderHistory

      void viewOrderHistory(ChatClient client, int userId)
      Abstract method for retrieving reservation history.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.

    • editPersonalDetails

      void editPersonalDetails(ChatClient client, int userId)
      Abstract method for editing personal profile details.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.

    • exitWaitingList

      default void exitWaitingList(ChatClient client, String confirmationCode)
      Sends a command to exit the digital waiting list.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      confirmationCode - The reservation code to be removed from the list.

    • navigateTo

      default void navigateTo(ChatClient client, javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String userType, int userId, String path, String title)
      The Central Navigation Engine: Handles FXML loading and Controller session injection.
      Parameters:
      client - The network client for server communication.
      event - The ActionEvent that initiated navigation.
      userType - The role of the user to be propagated.
      userId - The user ID to be propagated.
      path - The FXML resource path to load.
      title - The title of the new window stage.
